org.apache.logging.log4j

类 EventLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.EventLogger

  • public final class EventLogger
extends Object
    Logs "Events" that are represented as StructuredDataMessage.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Marker EVENT_MARKER
      Defines the Event Marker.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void logEvent(StructuredDataMessage msg)
      Logs events with a level of ALL.
      static void logEvent(StructuredDataMessage msg, Level level)
      Logs events and specify the logging level.

        public static final Marker EVENT_MARKER
        Defines the Event Marker.

    • 方法详细资料

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(StructuredDataMessage msg)
        Logs events with a level of ALL.
        参数:
        msg - The event StructuredDataMessage.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(StructuredDataMessage msg,
                            Level level)
        Logs events and specify the logging level.
        参数:
        msg - The event StructuredDataMessage.
        level - The logging Level.
